rComments: Alright ppl think ungar is a jerk but he's the most loveable jerk prof you'll ever have. I enjoy his lec and altho he can be a bit profane it's a nice change from the usual Prof. DO THE READING. his exams always use info from the readings and they are not the same as going to lec. Also his Assingment guidelines aren't v clear.  I Love his class!
teacherRatingTags: ['Tough grader', 'Get ready to read', "Skip class? You won't pass."]

rComments: 1. He tends to go off topic a little bit during lectures and might bring up some personal stories that may leave some students astonished.  2. He leaves blanks on his power point slides so it's a good idea to attend lectures if you want elaborate explanations  3 He looks intimidating but he is very nice, talkative and you should ask him questions
teacherRatingTags: ["Skip class? You won't pass.", 'Get ready to read', 'Lecture heavy']

rComments: He's clearly great in his field, but his assignments lack clarity, he is unapproachable, goes off topic, rants until he goes over his class time, and quite frankly is intimidating enough to warrant apprehension at going to office hours. His jokes are sometimes funny but often grossly over the line. Don't think I would want him as a prof again.
teacherRatingTags: ['Lecture heavy', 'Lots of homework', "Skip class? You won't pass."]

rComments: He is a really funny prof, but not so approachable. He gets off topic and stuff but don't take him lightly, his exams will destroy you. They are extremely specific, so you better not procrastinate your readings in his class.

I found this course to be extremely boring, but he helped me survive the boredom. Seriously, he is HILARIOUS. He may seem goofy at first, but his exams can be anything but goofy. Catch up with reading, attend every single lecture, and you can definitely do well.
Laid back stats prof, doesn't make it seem like you have to know everything. Explains concepts and tries to help you out while still making it up to you.

Awesome Prof! His lectures are really informative and easy to follow. It helps that he has an amazing sense of humour, which at times was too dark or sacastic for the rest of the facebooking/doughnut eating audience to comprehend. His intro to socio cources have easy exams (All MCQS!) but the lectures were just fun if you are into socio.

Friggin' Ungar cracks me up about his ex-wife and taking a wheelchaired person to the stripclub.  Study from the txtbk and his slides.  Use the CD that comes with the txtbook as he draws some or similar questions from it on the exams.  Friggin' Ungar I hope you read this and laugh! I'll remember you for the rest of my life. SOCA01Y3 2003-04! Booya!

Extremely funny and laid back. Lectures can get very fun & interesting depending on the topic. Loves to talk about his experiences and ex's which gets the class laughing. All textbook studying for Midterms, LOTS of lecture note SAs and mix of MC for final. Best to get a group and make chapter notes for the textbook and studying off that instead.

It's very easy to get a good grade. He's a great teacher. His lectures are funny and interesting. He makes you actually want to attend the lectures. One of the best teachers at the U of T Scarborough.
The professor is blazing something, he is so random, talks about the weirdest stuff. However his exams are incredibly easy, though his notes are confusing.
Not bad, isn't a hard course, have to study what's relevant, too many stupid irrelevant jokes but they keep you awake...
Overall his lectures are entertaining as his examples given in class are fresh and fun. however, his exams are a killer and they are very specific.
He's a very funny prof w/ a great sense of humor. He tries to explain each concept clearly, but sometimes fail to do so. Have not taken his exams yet so can't reali say anything about it.

Although hes very annoying and not a very mature person especially for someone his age, you have to admit hes ridicilously easy.  The short answers and multiple choice are a joke in his exams.  Don't need much studying, its no wonder why so many people take sociology
As fun as his class is, u wud think his exam wud be easier...but it isn't. so enjoy his class (its jokes), but make sure u take or have a friend who takes decent notes, if u wanna pass.
He's jokes! .... very entertaining prof
The tests were difficult...mostly short answer questions. The TAs were tough too.
This guy's hilarious! He should definitely do stand up. Some say he's not really approachable, but to be honest most of the questions students ask him in class sound pretty stupid.

Very funny guy but not approachable at all. Class feels more like listening to a stand up comedian than anything else, he keeps the jokes coming but it something gets out of hand. Fun class and actually interesting!
He is basically a good teacher.  Not very approachable though.
He's a funny guy. Keeps me laughing...but sometimes the 3 hr lectures (which only last 2.5hrs) can get looong...also his online notes seem very random. But overall he's pretty alright
Professor Ungar is a great professor.  He also replies to emails asap.  He explains things well and is witty.
soci.. prof is pretty good, i like his examples and sense of humour, but i just hope he can be easier on us
i wonder why hes so sour.. otherwise good
